annotation.title: NISAR L2 GOFF Product
annotation.reference_document: D-105010 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification L2 Geocoded Pixel Offsets

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceAbsoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number for the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryAbsoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number for the secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceIsJointObservation
string.annotation: "True" if any portion of the reference RSLC was acquired in a joint observation mode (e.g., L-band and S-band simultaneously), "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryIsJointObservation
string.annotation: "True" if any portion of the secondary RSLC was acquired in a joint observation mode (e.g., L-band and S-band simultaneously), "False" otherwise

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/trackNumber
integer.annotation: Track number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/frameNumber
integer.annotation: Frame number

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productDoi
string.annotation: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referencePlannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the reference RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryPlannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referencePlannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the reference RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryPlannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. "L0A": Unprocessed instrument data; "L0B": Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; "L1": Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and "L2": Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representing the bounding polygon of the image. Horizontal coordinates are WGS84 longitude followed by latitude (both in degrees), and the vertical coordinate is the height above the WGS84 ellipsoid in meters. The first point corresponds to the start-time, near-range radar coordinate, and the perimeter is traversed in counterclockwise order on the map. This means the traversal order in radar coordinates differs for left-looking and right-looking sensors. The polygon includes the four corners of the radar grid, with equal numbers of points distributed evenly in radar coordinates along each edge

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing date and time (in UTC) in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/platformName
string.annotation: Name of the platform used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Processing pipeline used to generate this granule. "Nominal": standard production system; "Urgent": time-sensitive processing in response to urgent response events; "Custom": user-initiated processing outside the nominal production system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is generated from reference and secondary RSLCs with different range bandwidths, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/compositeReleaseId
string.annotation: Unique version identifier of the science data production system

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/listOfLayers
string.annotation: List of pixel offset layers

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/mask

annotation.percentage_water: Percentage of pixels over water bodies and ocean

integer.annotation: Combination of water mask and a mask of subswaths of valid samples in the reference RSLC and geometrically-coregistered secondary RSLC. Each pixel value is a three-digit number: the most significant digit represents the water flag of that pixel the reference RSLC, where 1 is water and 0 is non-water; the second digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the reference RSLC; the least significant digit represents the subswath number of that pixel in the secondary RSLC. A value of 0 in either subswath digit indicates an invalid sample in the corresponding RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum
annotation.longitude_of_central_meridian: The line of longitude at the center of a map projection generally used as the basis for constructing the projection
annotation.scale_factor_at_central_meridian: A multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/yCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/grids/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/xCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Raw (unculled, unfiltered) along-track pixel offsets

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/referenceSlantRange
real.annotation: Slant range of the reference RSLC in meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/referenceZeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in seconds since UTC epoch of the reference RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of the line-of-sight (LOS) unit vector, defined from the target to the sensor, expressed in the east-north-up (ENU) coordinate system with its origin at the target location

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of the line-of-sight (LOS) unit vector, defined from the target to the sensor, expressed in the east-north-up (ENU) coordinate system with its origin at the target location

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of the along-track unit vector at the target location, expressed in the east-north-up (ENU) coordinate system and projected onto the horizontal plane (i.e., excluding the up component)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of the along-track unit vector at the target location, expressed in the east-north-up (ENU) coordinate system and projected onto the horizontal plane (i.e., excluding the up component)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/secondaryZeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in seconds since UTC epoch of the secondary RSLC image

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/secondarySlantRange
real.annotation: Slant range of the secondary RSLC in meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/parallelBaseline

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Parallel component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/perpendicularBaseline

annotation.mean_value: Arithmetic average of the numeric data points
annotation.min_value: Minimum value of the numeric data points
annotation.max_value: Maximum value of the numeric data points
annotation.sample_stddev: Standard deviation of the numeric data points

real.annotation: Perpendicular component of the InSAR baseline

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum
annotation.longitude_of_central_meridian: The line of longitude at the center of a map projection generally used as the basis for constructing the projection
annotation.scale_factor_at_central_meridian: A multiplier for reducing a distance obtained from a map by computation or scaling to the actual distance along the central meridian

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/radarGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid
real.annotation: Height values above WGS84 Ellipsoid corresponding to the radar grid

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference terrain height as a function of map coordinates for reference RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/rfiMitigationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation was applied during the generation of the reference RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/rfiMitigation
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation in the reference RSLC, either "ST-EVD" or "FDNF" (or "disabled" if no RFI mitigation was applied)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if reference RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isFullFrame

annotation.frameCoveragePercentage: Percentage of NISAR frame containing processed data
annotation.thresholdPercentage: Threshold percentage used to determine if the product is full frame or partial frame

string.annotation: "True" if the product fully covers a NISAR frame, "False" if partial coverage

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Slant range start distance for the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the reference RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for reference RSLC raster layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of the reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of the reference RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for reference RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/rfiMitigationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation was applied during the generation of the secondary RSLC

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/rfiMitigation
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation in the secondary RSLC, either "ST-EVD" or "FDNF" (or "disabled" if no RFI mitigation was applied)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if secondary RSLC is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference terrain height as a function of map coordinates for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Slant range start distance for the secondary RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the secondary RSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for secondary RSLC raster layers

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time (in UTC) of the secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time (in UTC) of the secondary RSLC product in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.sssssssss

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for secondary RSLC

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of common Doppler centroid between reference and secondary RSLCs

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerBandwidth
real.annotation: Common Doppler bandwidth between reference and secondary RSLCs

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed slant range bandwidth for frequency A pixel offsets layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth for frequency A pixel offsets layers

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/correlationSurfaceOversampling
integer.annotation: Oversampling factor of the cross-correlation surface

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/margin
integer.annotation: Margin in pixels around reference RSLC edges excluded during cross-correlation computation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeStartPixel
integer.annotation: Reference RSLC start pixel in slant range

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackStartPixel
integer.annotation: Reference RSLC start pixel in along-track

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/slantRangeSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation skip window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/alongTrackSkipWindowSize

integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation search window size in pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/pixelOffsets/frequencyA/layer3/slantRangeSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range cross-correlation search window size in pixels

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/rangeIonosphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the range ionospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/azimuthIonosphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the azimuth ionospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/hydrostaticTroposphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the hydrostatic tropospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/wetTroposphericCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the wet tropospheric correction is applied to improve geolocation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/temporalBaseline
integer.annotation: Time interval between reference and secondary RSLCs

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/reference/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/reference/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/reference/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/reference/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/reference/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/secondary/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/secondary/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/secondary/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/secondary/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/orbit/secondary/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/reference/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/reference/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/reference/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/reference/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/secondary/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time since UTC epoch corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/secondary/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/secondary/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/attitude/secondary/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/complexGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for complex-valued datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/integerGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for integer datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/floatingGeocodingInterpolation
string.annotation: Geocoding interpolation algorithm for floating point datasets

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding/demInterpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/coregistrationMethod
string.annotation: RSLC coregistration method

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/geometryCoregistration
string.annotation: Geometry coregistration algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/coregistration/resampling
string.annotation: Secondary RSLC resampling algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/crossCorrelation/layer1/crossCorrelationAlgorithm
string.annotation: Cross-correlation algorithm for layer 1

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/crossCorrelation/layer2/crossCorrelationAlgorithm
string.annotation: Cross-correlation algorithm for layer 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/crossCorrelation/layer3/crossCorrelationAlgorithm
string.annotation: Cross-correlation algorithm for layer 3

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1ReferenceSlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input reference L1 RSLC products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1SecondarySlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input secondary L1 RSLC products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/orbitFiles
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demSource
string.annotation: Description of the input digital elevation model (DEM)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/waterMaskSource
string.annotation: Description of the input water mask

string.name: /science/LSAR/GOFF/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/staticLayersDataAccess
string.annotation: Location of the static layers product associated with this product (URL or DOI)

shape.name: scalar
shape.annotation: Scalar values

shape.name: numberOfReferenceObservations
shape.annotation: Number of observations in the reference RSLC product

shape.name: numberOfSecondaryObservations
shape.annotation: Number of observations in the secondary RSLC product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencies
shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequencyA

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAOffsetLayers
shape.annotation: Number of pixel offset layers associated with L-SAR frequencyA

shape.name: offsetShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR datasets in the pixelOffsets group

shape.name: offsetWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR datasets within the pixelOffsets group

shape.name: offsetLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR datasets within the pixelOffsets group

shape.name: radarCubeShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with metadata cubes

shape.name: radarCubeHeight
shape.annotation: Height dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: radarCubeLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: radarCubeWidth
shape.annotation: Width dimension of the metadata cube
